name: Trainiac
description: Shoot your way through enemies as you jump from train to train in this unique action game. The difficulty increases as you progress. Watch your back as you might encounter drive-by shootings. How far will you get?
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64 bit Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
